item.title: $8.33/mo Small Business & Residential VoIP
item.description: Forget expensive phone plans advertised on TV, there’s a better option for homes and small businesses. For just $8.33 a month, Phone Power offers unlimited calls within the US and Canada, plus a free hour of international calls. This Voice over Internet Protocol (VoIP) service works with your existing internet connection. Phone Power provides a free adapter that connects to your modem and lets you use two phones on a single line.

item.title: Talking Cheap on the QT
item.description: A new telephone service is offering lower-than-expected rates for local, long-distance, and international calls. This service is widely available, so everyone can take advantage of it. If you’re looking to save money on your home phone bill and haven’t been impressed with other VoIP options, you should consider QT Talk. The “QT Talk North America Plus” plan is unique because it provides unlimited calling to the U.S., Canada, and Puerto Rico, along with a very low rate to a select group of international destinations.
